name: Some school projects
description:
Two games : 

The first one was on my first year, did this in one week. It's just a simple die & retry plateformer. Play with the directional arrows and space to jump !

The second one is a game on my third year, in 1 day. The subject was "serious game". I think this one is cool and work well as a very little game. I took the characters from "Guacamalee" because I loved this game (still love it).

One button game : space
